refnamediv.refpurpose: Replaces the existing transformation matrix in the combination specified that corresponds to the member specified.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Replaces the existing transformation matrix in the combination specified that corresponds to the member specified. The transformation matrix may be specified with an I to indicate the identity matrix, or it may be specified as 16 elements listed row-by-row. The copymat command allows the user to copy an existing transformation matrix.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the putmat command to set the transformation matrix for a specified region in a specified group to the identity matrix.

example.title: Set the transformation matrix for a specified region in a specified group to the identity matrix.
example.para: Sets the transformation matrix for regiona in group1 to the identity matrix.
